name: platformaker
description:
A platformer where you cannot control the hero. What do you do, when a platformer character can't be controlled?

platformaker is a puzzle platformer where you need to build the game level while playing it, so that the hero can reach the goal.

Drag-and-Drop different types of platforms and blocks to build a 'playable' level. Prior experience of playing platformer games is critical for success 😉

Built for GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control). Game has 8 levels.

Psst: If you get stuck anywhere, use the restart/reload button.
